author: CBS Philly
title: Notorious B.O.B. Wins Wing Bowl 25
text:
Video: Wingettes at Wing Bowl 25! 
“I’ve won a lot of contests all over the world, but this the one that anybody from the Philadelphia area dreams of winning when they’re little kids,” Notorious B.O.B told 94WIP after winning Wing Bowl 25 on Friday morning. “This is it, this is my day. I’m just gonna close my eyes and try to remember this experience.” 
He is only the 3rd Pennsylvania resident to win Wing Bowl and he cares about the history of the event. 
Video: Coolio At Wing Bowl 25! 
Notorious B.O.B. says he can name the competitors that partake the event year over year and he considers them all heroes. “You can really appreciate what it must have taken Heavy Kevy to win,” is what Notorious B.O.B. told the WIP mid-day show. 
Related: Top 8 Moments Of Wing Bowl 25 
He says burgers are the easiest thing for him to eat and he’s seen past victories eating 20 pounds of grits and lots of chowder!
